SIGNATURE BELOW IS TO CERTIFY THAT THE ABOVE NAMED MATERIALS ARE PROPERLY CLASSIFIED, DESCRIBED, PACKAGED,
MARKED, LABELED, AND ARE IN PROPER CONDITION, FOR TRANSPORTATION, ACCORDING TO THE APPLICATION AND REGULATIONS
THIS DOCUMENT IS TO BE RETAINED BY THE SHIPPER / RECEIVER FOR NO LESS THAN 365 DAYS.
THE FOLLOWING FORM APPLIES TO THE TRANSPORTATION OF SAMPLES THAT HAVE NO COMMERCIAL VALUE.

i.b: TOLL FREE 24 HOUR EMERGENCY CONTACT (Fire, Accident, Exposure, Spill) CHEMTREC 1-800-424-9300

page.text: Shore Tank was active during movement.
Towing company did not provide sequential port log for the subject tow.
VEF history has movements ranging from 1,090.80 bbls barge over shore to 490.93 bbls shore over
Terminal would not allow a Line Displacement to take place
On Behalf of our principals, we hereby notify you that on the above date, the following occurred:
Terminal didn’t allow adequate settling time after movement.
Delay from 0600 to 1945 on 8/19/20. Delay due to awaiting terminal readiness.
Delay from 0015 to 0245 on 8/20/20. Delay due to awaiting tankerman to connect cargo hose.
Accordingly, we are holding your terminal, operators, and other interested parties responsible for the loss and damage
thereby sustained, as well as any consequential loss and damage arising therefrom. Will you kindly acknowledge receipt on
the copy thereof and return to us.

i.b: The signatures thus obtained are for receipt only and in no way acknowledge
